knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
# Load up necessary packages up front so that if you hand this code off to a
# coworker, it will fail at the beginning of the script
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

```



```{r}
# Read in the first data set that will be used within the report
data <- 
  read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MadPacUte/CAIR_2021/main/CAIR_2021_Data.csv")

# Read in the second data set that will be used within the report
data_2 <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MadPacUte/CAIR_2021/main/CAIR_2021_Data_2.csv")
  
```


```{r}
# Append the data together 
data_raw <- 
  data %>% 
  bind_rows(data_2)

```
